Ion_Field.display_target_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near the Elemental!

Ion_Blast.display_help: Sends a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Ion Blast deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Ion_Burst.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ion Burst deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

SummonFX.display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for when Faathim is released.
SummonFX.display_target_help: This power is simply the visual fx for when Faathim is released.

Heal_Other.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Healing_Aura.display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate
Healing_Aura.display_target_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Fortitude.display_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single ally's Accuracy, damage, and Defense. The target takes less damage from successful attacks. Fortitude also protects the targeted hero from Psionic attacks and damage. Recharge: Long
Fortitude.display_target_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single ally's Accuracy, damage, and Defense. The target takes less damage from successful attacks. Fortitude also protects the targeted hero from Psionic attacks and damage. Recharge: Long

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Protection_Shield.display_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.display_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.display_target_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.display_target_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

Blizzard.display_help: The Blizzard is freezing you. Your Accuracy, movement speed and attack speed are reduced. You are taking damage over time.
